SELECT *
, ( CASE WHEN tppr_es_i18n = 1 THEN ( SELECT p18n_texto FROM tbl_parametro_i18n_p18n WHERE p18n_prvr_pk = ANY ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = prdt_prmt_pk AND NOW() BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, NOW()) ) AND p18n_idioma = 'es_ES' ) WHEN tppr_tpdt_pk IS NOT NULL THEN ( SELECT prdt_cadena FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE prdt_prvr_pk = ANY ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = sql.prdt_prmt_pk AND NOW() BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, NOW()) ) AND prdt_tpdt_pk = tppr_tpdt_pk ) END ) AS p18n_texto
FROM vw_parametro_dato_prdt sql
